itemDisplayName: Deploy a Windows Server 2012 R2 VM in the location of your resource group
description: This template allows you to deploy a Windows Server 2012 R2 VM, using the latest patched version. This will deploy in the location of the resource group you execute it and use a D1 VM Size.
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys a Windows VM, using the latest patched version.
